mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.DatasetRequiredException
mdException.label: Dataset Required Exception
mdException.message: Please select at least one dataset for upload.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.TooManyDatesException
mdException.message: Dataset [{dataset}] contains too many dates. Datasets must contain either 'Calendar year' column or exactly one date.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.CalendarYearRequiredException
mdException.message: Dataset [{dataset}] must contain either 'Calendar year' column or exactly one date.
